member.name: T:Twilio.WebMatrix.Twilio
member.summary: A set of Twilio helpers for WebMatrix sites

member.name: M:Twilio.WebMatrix.Twilio.SendSms(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.param: The number to send the message from
The number to send the message to
The contents of the message, up to 160 characters
The URL to notify of the message status

member.name: M:Twilio.WebMatrix.Twilio.MakeCall(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.param: The phone number to call from
The phone number to call to
The TwiML URL to use for controlling this call
The URL to notify upon completion of the call
The HTTP method to use when requesting the statusCallback URL
The URL to request upon encountering an in-call error
The HTTP method to use when requesting the fallbackUrl
The action to take when encountering an answering machine
The DTMF touch tone digits to transmit when the call is answered
The amount of time to allow a call to ring before ending

member.summary: The AccountSid to authenticate with when making requests
